reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Building the capacity of Small and Medium Enterprises to resist corruption in Vietnam

description.narrative: The project is designed for a local anti-corruption education programme to provide Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) with practical means to strengthen their resistance to corruption, implement the best international compliance standards in their business operations, and develop opportunities for collective action, thereby encouraging competition, growth, and business confidence as well as opening up benefits and opportunities to UK companies that have SMEs in their supply chains.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
